explains: n. 新来者，新手；新鲜事物

sentences.en: A newcomer has appeared on the fashion scene.
sentences.cn: 时装界出现了一位新人。

sentences.en: They were joined by a newcomer who came striding across a field.
sentences.cn: 他们中又来了个新人，那人穿过一块田地大步走过来。

sentences.en: The grandfather, coming out of the hut, greeted the newcomer with great respect.
sentences.cn: 爷爷从小屋里出来，很尊敬地问候新来的人。
